game_description: Experience the thrill of the 10 most famous battles of World War II in a third-person retro voxel shooter miniature world. Take on enemy bosses like the Yamato Battleship, the giant zeppelin, the fearsome Tiger Tank, and many more by upgrading your plane. Invite a friend to play through the campaign in a chaotic and exciting online co-op. Complete 10 epic campaigns like Battle of Midway, D-Day, Stalingrad, El Alamein, and more! Experience an innovative two-hand VR control system: the right hand moves the plane and attacks while the left hand collects health, coins, bombs, and more! Dominate levels full of enemies to destroy, cities to capture, and bosses to defeat. Unlock and upgrade 10 planes including the iconic and historic B17 Bomber, Hurricane, Typhoon, Mustang, and more! Collect coins, chests bombs, rockets, and powerups while dodging waves of enemies and bullets Play with a friend in an exciting online co-op or increase the difficulty to compete on a global leaderboard
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Swedish
review_1: This is a wonderful game but..... not for an old guy as the one level, easy mode that I played is much too long. Fingers were tired from pressing the continuous shooting button and waving the controller around. I love the instantaneous movement of the airplane that made me feel like a kid zooming my plane around and ducking the slow moving bullets coming towards me. Great game. Only played one level and because of it was so long I was sweating and tired by the end of it; had to go take a nap afterwards (just kidding) but the level was long and repetitive. Perhaps there might be some variations in the next levels but I only play one level to get the gist of the game and I write a full review based on the first 30 minutes of playing which is one level. I'll still give it a 5 for a great concept of a game and the zooming of the hand held plane. Might get around to playing another level someday... but for now... too tired.
review_2: I was in two minds weather to get this but I'm glad I did, great gameplay very smooth, really got that just one more go to improve score vibe.
